extensionDescription.message: Förenkla ditt surfande genom att blockera kommentarer på nätet!
extensionDescription.description: A descriptive text about what the addon does.

formBlocked.message: Det finns dolda kommentarer på sidan. Du måste visa de för att kunna skicka formuläret!
formBlocked.description: Displayed notification text when the addon stops the user from sending a form with hidden comments.

hideComments.description: Displayed on buttons to let the user hide comments.

showComments.description: Displayed on buttons to let the user show comments.
